description:
OR's Hemispheres styles are backcountry icons, and the Hemispheres II Bibs are better than ever.

Proven 3L Gore-Tex® protection, unparalleled stretch and strategic updates make the Hemispheres II Bibs the ultimate solution for backcountry skiing and snowboarding. Nothing else delivers the same combination of trusted weather protection and high-mobility comfort.
name: Outdoor Research Hemispheres II Bibs - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved Gore-Tex C-Knit Technology 3L, 100% Nylon 70D
Gore-Tex With Stretch Technology 2L 37%, Nylon 44%, Polyester 19%
